name: Gravity Taxi - Orbit Kart
description:
+++ 24-hour discount! 100% FREE! Are you the best driver? +++

“Drive Taxi against Extreme Gravity”
“Earn Maximum Points”
“Addictive Game”
_______________________________

It’s the time to test your driving against gravity! Experience yourself how concentration works on road full of obstacles. Gravity Taxi shares an ultra-immersive Taxi Driving adventure and visual retreat for you.

Just start driving your Taxi on the road while avoiding the obstacles confronted by you. Collect the fuel on the road and earn the points to beat your friends online, the maximum fuel you will collect the more points you will get. But do not forget to drive on the road unless of getting your Taxi on Grass.

So get your hands on the accelerator and run your Taxi to the extreme! Download it today and share it with your friends!!

Game Features:
“Interactive Taxi Driving Game”
“Soothing Graphics”
“Play on Portrait or Landscape Mode”
